page.title: 08LEISURE COMPLEXES,WASHINGTON
page.content: These are part of the lifestyles of many people in washington and the surrounding area. The{Northumbria {Centre}on Stephenson Industrial Estate is sponsored by{Philips}factory; many of the staff use it for recreation. The Centre has many facilities including gymnastics,keep fit, karate,judo and table tennis. Individual or family membership is available as well as associate membership for{sports clubs}and businesses. {The George Washington Hotel}has a leisure club, for members only, which opened 2 years ago. It is open 16 hours a day, 7am to 11pm. The Hotel also has facilities for{snooker}and golf. The{golf course}has been open 5 years and has been used by some famous personalities.
